import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Formik, Field, Form, ErrorMessage } from "formik"; import * as Yup from "yup"; const AddLandlord = (props: any) => { const { details } = props; const [formActive, setFormActive] = useState(false); const handleSubmit = (values: {}, setSubmitting: { (isSubmitting: boolean): void; (arg0: boolean): void }) => { console.log(values); try { setSubmitting(true); setFormActive(true); // submit your form here } catch (error) { console.log(error); } finally { setSubmitting(false); setFormActive(false); } }; return (
{ handleSubmit(values, setSubmitting); }} >
); }; export default AddLandlord;
